body:
What this function does is pretty ambiguous. It nominally is checking things are on the same device, but it has very subtle exceptions. Maybe change this so getDevice returns: 

```
Unknown | AnyDevice | CPU | GPU i
```
And then define `compatibleDevices` based on those results.
body_html:
What this function does is pretty ambiguous. It nominally is checking things are on the same device, but it has very subtle exceptions. Maybe change this so getDevice returns:

And then define compatibleDevices based on those results.
